report.heading: LinkDetective Report
report.noreporttext: Make sure that LinkDetective is set up to run as a scheduled task. Please note that the report is kept in memory only, and is lost if the server is rebooted.

pagereport.heading: LinkDetective Page Report
pagereport.noreporttext: Make sure that LinkDetective is set up to run as a scheduled task. Please note that the report is kept in memory only, and is lost if the server is rebooted.
pagereport.notcheckedheading: This page was not checked by LinkDetective.
pagereport.notcheckedtext: This page was not checked by LinkDetective the last time it ran
pagereport.reportoktext: No broken links was found on this page when it was checked by LinkDetective on
pagereport.reportfailedheading: broken link(s) was found by LinkDetective! (Checked:
pagereport.checkfailed: broken link(s) was found by LinkDetective!

errors.notresolved: The remote name could not be resolved
errors.couldnotconnect: Unable to connect to the remote server
errors.remoteservererror: The remote server returned an error
